articles.description: Microsoft will reportedly build an all-in-one 'super app' to compete with Apple and Google mobile dominance.
articles.content:
Microsoft will reportedly build an all-in-one ‘super app’ to compete with Apple and Google mobile dominance.
The application might combine shopping, messaging, web search, news and other services al… [+761 chars]
